or size to meet gauge 4 notions removable stitch markers 5 yarn needle to weave in ends 6 scissors 7 yarn mary maxim mellowspun 8 100% acrylic 284yds/100g color a shown in white or sand mary maxim prism 9 100% acrylic 290yds/100g color b shown in autumn mist or sunset yardage total yardage 1140 1190 1250 1300 1375 1450 1530 1610 1690 main color a yardage 820 855 900 935 990 1040 1102 1160 1215 3 4 4 4 4 4 4 5 5 skeins accent color b yardage 320 335 350 365 385 410 428 450 475 2 skeins each color yarn substitutions wecrochet swish 10 - 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g premier anti-pilling everyday dk yarn 11 -100% acrylic 273yds/100g premier colorfusion dk yarn 12 - 100% acrylic 325yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet ehdc - extended half_double_crochet ehdc2tog - extended half_double_crochet two together round - round single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 5 sts and 16 row = 4 by 4 worked in the overlay mosaic pattern 15 sts and 10 row = 4 by 4 worked in the ehdc not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 32 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 actual measurements 32 35 5 39 5 42 5 47 51 55 5 59 75 64 this garment has an oversized relaxed fit and is meant to be worn with a 2-4 inch ease for a more fitted look go down a size skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are
